title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\SpeechRecognitionResult
name: SpeechRecognitionResult
description:
A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.SpeechRecognitionResult

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.alternatives
params.description: May contain one or more recognition hypotheses (up to the maximum specified in max_alternatives). These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.

params.name: data.channel_tag
params.description: For multi-channel audio, this is the channel number corresponding to the recognized result for the audio from that channel. For audio_channel_count = N, its output values can range from '1' to 'N'.

methods.name: getAlternatives
methods.description:
May contain one or more recognition hypotheses (up to the maximum specified in max_alternatives).

These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.cloud.speech.v1.SpeechRecognitionAlternative alternatives = 1;

For audio_channel_count = N, its output values can range from '1' to 'N'.
